Package org.ruleant.ariadne.lib

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGeoCoordinate
    Abstract class for formatting a geological coordinate.
    AriadneLocation
    Custom Ariadne Location object, it inherits from Location class, but overrides the getString() method.
    DebugLevel
    Class checking debug level This class will get the current Debug level from SharedPreferences.
    FormatUtils
    Methods to convert values to formatted string.
    Latitude
    Class for formatting latitude.
    Longitude
    Class for formatting longitude.
    Navigator
    Class with several methods useful for navigation.
    StoredDestination
    StoredDestination saves a location, it will store a location for future use, and will the save the location when the application is stopped.
    StoredLocation
    StoredLocation saves a location, it will store a location for future use, and will the save the location when the application is stopped.
